title: Google\Cloud\Orchestration\Airflow\Service\V1\ScheduledSnapshotsConfig
name: ScheduledSnapshotsConfig
description:
The configuration for scheduled snapshot creation mechanism.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.orchestration.airflow.service.v1.ScheduledSnapshotsConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enabled
params.description: Optional. Whether scheduled snapshots creation is enabled.

params.name: data.snapshot_location
params.description: Optional. The Cloud Storage location for storing automatically created snapshots.

params.name: data.snapshot_creation_schedule
params.description: Optional. The cron expression representing the time when snapshots creation mechanism runs. This field is subject to additional validation around frequency of execution.

params.name: data.time_zone
params.description: Optional. Time zone that sets the context to interpret snapshot_creation_schedule.
